cookingTips: Chop almonds and parsley as finely as possible for a uniform, cohesive sauce
Use fresh flat-leaf parsley for superior flavor compared to curly varieties
Whisk salsa just before serving to prevent oil and solids from separating; it can be made ahead and refrigerated
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This nutty, herbaceous salsa is versatile and elegant. Serve with grilled fish, roasted vegetables, or crusty bread for dipping.
